DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [dbo].[@{variables('metadata_table_name')}];

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[@{variables('metadata_table_name')}](
    [export] varchar(5),
    [import] varchar(5),
    [entity_display_name] VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    [entity_logical_name] VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    [logical_name] VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    [schema_name] VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    [display_name] VARCHAR(100),
    [attribute_type] VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    [description] VARCHAR(1000),
    [custom_attribute] VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL,
    [type] VARCHAR(10),
    [additional_data] VARCHAR(1000)
)
